statements: SELECT * FROM QualityControlChecks;
SELECT stage, result FROM QualityControlChecks WHERE check_type = 'Initial';
SELECT id, stage, check_type FROM QualityControlChecks WHERE result = TRUE ORDER BY stage ASC;
SELECT * FROM QualityControlChecks WHERE stage = 'Final' AND result = FALSE;
SELECT id, check_type, compliance_notes FROM QualityControlChecks ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM QualityControlChecks WHERE result = TRUE ORDER BY stage DESC, id;
SELECT id, stage, check_type FROM QualityControlChecks WHERE stage = 'Stage 1' AND result = FALSE;
SELECT id, check_type, compliance_notes FROM QualityControlChecks WHERE compliance_notes IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM QualityControlChecks WHERE stage LIKE '%Stage%' AND result = TRUE;
SELECT id, stage, result FROM QualityControlChecks WHERE check_type = 'Final Inspection';
SELECT * FROM production_quality_checks WHERE check_id = 1
SELECT check_id, stage_name, check_status FROM production_quality_checks WHERE stage_name LIKE 'Final%'
SELECT check_id, stage_name, check_description FROM production_quality_checks WHERE check_status = TRUE
SELECT * FROM compliance_results WHERE compliance_status = FALSE
SELECT check_id, result_details FROM compliance_results
SELECT * FROM production_quality_checks WHERE check_status = true;
SELECT stage_name, check_status FROM production_quality_checks;
SELECT p.*, c.result_details FROM production_quality_checks p JOIN compliance_results c ON p.check_id = c.check_id;
SELECT c.result_id, p.stage_name, c.compliance_status FROM production_quality_checks p JOIN compliance_results c ON p.check_id = c.check_id WHERE c.compliance_status = true;
SELECT p.stage_name AS Stage, c.result_details AS Compliance_Details FROM production_quality_checks p JOIN compliance_results c ON p.check_id = c.check_id;
SELECT * FROM production_stage;
SELECT stage_id, stage_name FROM production_stage ORDER BY stage_id DESC;
SELECT stage_name FROM production_stage WHERE stage_id = 1;
SELECT check_name, performed_by FROM quality_check;
SELECT check_id, stage_id, result FROM check_result WHERE result = 'Pass';
SELECT * FROM production_stage WHERE stage_id = 1;
SELECT check_name, performed_by FROM quality_check ORDER BY check_name DESC;
SELECT check_id, check_name, performed_by FROM quality_check WHERE check_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT stage_id, stage_name, result FROM production_stage JOIN check_result ON production_stage.stage_id = check_result.stage_id;

SELECT result_id, check_name, stage_name FROM check_result JOIN quality_check ON check_result.check_id = quality_check.check_id JOIN production_stage ON check_result.stage_id = production_stage.stage_id ORDER BY result_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM stage_1_checks;
SELECT id, check_date, check_result FROM stage_2_checks;
SELECT check_result, check_date, id FROM stage_3_checks;
SELECT id, check_date FROM stage_1_checks WHERE check_result = 'Pass';
SELECT report_id, stage_1_passed, stage_2_passed, stage_3_passed FROM compliance_reports WHERE stage_1_passed = true;
SELECT * FROM stage_1_checks WHERE check_result = 'Pass';
SELECT id, check_date FROM stage_2_checks WHERE check_result = 'Fail' ORDER BY check_date DESC;
SELECT report_id, stage_1_passed, stage_2_passed, stage_3_passed FROM compliance_reports WHERE stage_1_passed = TRUE AND stage_3_passed = FALSE;
SELECT id, check_result, DATE_FORMAT(check_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS formatted_date FROM stage_1_checks WHERE check_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM stage_3_checks WHERE id IN (SELECT id FROM stage_1_checks WHERE check_result = 'Fail');
SELECT * FROM QualityControlChecksAtDifferentStagesOfProduction
SELECT stage_of_production, check_type, check_result FROM QualityControlChecksAtDifferentStagesOfProduction WHERE id = 1
SELECT stage_of_production, check_result FROM QualityControlChecksAtDifferentStagesOfProduction WHERE check_type = 'Final Inspection'
SELECT * FROM QualityControlChecksAtDifferentStagesOfProduction WHERE check_result = TRUE
SELECT id, stage_of_production FROM QualityControlChecksAtDifferentStagesOfProduction WHERE check_result = FALSE
SELECT * FROM QualityControlChecksAtDifferentStagesOfProduction WHERE check_type = 'Visual Inspection';
SELECT stage_of_production, check_type FROM QualityControlChecksAtDifferentStagesOfProduction WHERE check_result = TRUE ORDER BY stage_of_production DESC;
SELECT id, stage_of_production, check_result FROM QualityControlChecksAtDifferentStagesOfProduction WHERE check_type IN ('Weight Check', 'Material Composition Check') ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM QualityControlChecksAtDifferentStagesOfProduction WHERE stage_of_production != 'Final Assembly' AND check_result = FALSE;
SELECT id, stage_of_production, check_type, check_result FROM QualityControlChecksAtDifferentStagesOfProduction WHERE check_result IS NULL ORDER BY check_type ASC, stage_of_production DESC;
